hero.title: The Home of AI Experts in Israel
hero.subtitle: The first platform connecting companies and organizations with the brightest minds in Artificial Intelligence.

mission.title: The Revolution is Here
mission.p1: In a world where AI changes the rules of the game daily, we identified a real need: organizations seek reliable knowledge, and experts seek an easy way to reach their audience.
mission.p2: We are here to provide a simple, transparent, and efficient technological solution. No unnecessary bureaucracy, just direct and professional connection. One click, and you have an expert.

institutional.title: Strategic Expert Center
institutional.desc: We consolidate Israel's top experts for you. You receive professional service directly from your chosen expert, with our guidance along the way.

booking.title: One-Click Booking
booking.desc: We are here to ensure you find the perfect expert. Our system allows you to manage the project transparently and choose the best path forward.

quality.title: Cream of the Crop
quality.desc: Our team of experts undergoes rigorous screening. We guarantee professionalism, proven experience, and the highest level of knowledge delivery.

cta.title: Ready to Lead Your Organization Forward?
cta.sub: Find the right expert for you today.

hero.title: Let's Grow Together as Partners
hero.subtitle: We believe your expertise is the most important asset. Our goal is to let you focus on what you do best ‚Äì self-development and knowledge sharing ‚Äì while we handle marketing and connecting you to leading organizations.

leads.title: We Handle the Clients
leads.desc: We free up your valuable time by managing marketing, sales, and bringing high-quality inquiries from private and institutional clients directly to you.

admin.title: Technology at Your Service
admin.desc: Enjoy a platform that includes a convenient availability and calendar management system, and receive focused leads - all in one place.

community.title: Focus on What Matters
community.desc: You invest in your professional development and staying at the forefront of technology, and we take care of the branding and technological envelope that helps you grow.

openPositions.title: We Are Hiring the Best
openPositions.subtitle: Choose your path and join the elite team.

jobs.title: Automation Expert & AI Implementer
jobs.description: Connect organizations to the future. Build complex automation workflows (Make/Zapier), deploy AI agents, and sync information systems.

jobs.title: GenAI Lecturer & Workshop Leader
jobs.description: Democratize the revolution. Deliver inspiring lectures and practical workshops for executives, marketing teams, and HR in leading organizations.

jobs.title: Strategic Consultant / Fractional CAIO
jobs.description: Lead the change. Guide senior management in forming AI strategy, selecting tools, and managing organizational change.

jobs.title: AI Developer / RAG Specialist
jobs.description: Build the next big thing. Develop knowledge-base chatbots, fine-tune models, and build complex integrations.

privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPage.intro: AI Experts ("we", "us") respects the privacy of our users. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

sections.title: 1. Information Collection
sections.content: We collect information you provide directly (such as name, email, CVs in contact/application forms) and information collected automatically during site use (such as IP address, browser type, usage data) using Cookies and similar technologies.

sections.title: 2. Use of Information
sections.content: We use the information to provide our services, connect clients with experts, improve user experience, send relevant updates, and for operational and security purposes.

sections.title: 3. Information Sharing
sections.content: We do not sell your personal information to third parties. We may share information with service providers assisting our operations (like emailing or hosting), or with experts/clients as part of the service, and when required by law.

sections.title: 4. Data Security
sections.content: We implement standard security measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, but please note that no system is completely immune.

sections.title: 5. Your Rights
sections.content: You have the right to review the information held about you, request its correction or deletion, in accordance with the law. Contact us for inquiries.

sections.title: 6. Contact Us
sections.content: For any questions regarding this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: info@brandmeweb.com

termsPage.title: Terms of Service
termsPage.intro: Welcome to AI Experts. By using this website, you agree to the following terms and conditions.

sections.title: 1. Nature of Service
sections.content: AI Experts is a marketplace platform connecting clients with independent AI professionals. We act solely as an intermediary. We do not employ the experts and are not a party to the direct business agreement between clients and experts.

sections.title: 2. Independent Contractors
sections.content: All experts listed on the platform are independent contractors. No employer-employee relationship exists between AI Experts and any user. Experts are solely responsible for their service quality and deliverables.

sections.title: 3. Launch & Beta Phase
sections.content: The platform is currently in a Beta launch phase. During this period, the service is provided free of charge for both experts and clients. AI Experts is not a financial party to transactions at this stage, and communication and payments occur directly between the expert and the client.

sections.title: 4. Privacy & Data Sharing
sections.content: Upon accepting a bid, contact details (Email, Name) are automatically shared between the client and the expert to facilitate communication. We do not share your data with third parties otherwise.

sections.title: 5. Disclaimer
sections.content: While we verify expert profiles, the final responsibility for due diligence lies with the client. We cannot guarantee the outcome of any project or consultation.

sections.title: 6. Prohibited Conduct
sections.content: Illegal use, harassment, or posting offensive content is strictly prohibited. We reserve the right to suspend any user violating these terms.

howItWorksPage.title: How It Works
howItWorksPage.subtitle: AI Experts platform makes finding and hiring AI experts simple, secure, and efficient.

steps.title: 1. Focused Search
steps.desc: Use our smart search engine to find experts by domain (Generative AI, Strategy, Automation), experience level, or service type.

steps.title: 2. Check Compatibility
steps.desc: View the expert's full profile: professional experience, reviews from past clients, work examples, and price per hour/project.

steps.title: 3. Secure Booking
steps.desc: Connect with the expert, set up a kick-off meeting, and start the project. We provide the infrastructure to make it happen.

steps.title: 4. Project Kick-off
steps.desc: The expert performs the task. At this stage, communication and payments are handled directly between you and the expert.

steps.title: 1. Create Profile
steps.desc: Apply to join our network. After screening and verification, we'll build a professional profile showcasing your knowledge and experience.

steps.title: 2. Set Availability
steps.desc: Sync your calendar and define when you're available for consultations or lectures. You set the price and service terms.

steps.title: 3. Receive Inquiries
steps.desc: We handle marketing and bringing clients. You receive alerts for new bookings and project requests directly to your email and dashboard.

steps.title: 4. Direct Engagement
steps.desc: Once the project is confirmed, you engage directly with the client. We provide the platform for visibility and connection.

items.a: Using the platform is currently free for both clients and experts during our Beta phase. Communication and payments are handled directly between you and the expert.
Every expert undergoes a verification process including an interview and professional background check to ensure service quality.

In the current Beta phase, payments are handled directly between the client and the expert. We provide the infrastructure for connection and project management but do not charge commissions or process payments at this time.

pricingPage.title: Simple, Transparent, and Fair
pricingPage.subtitle: We believe in a model where everyone wins. No subscription fees, no commitments. You only pay when there are results.

clients.title: For Organizations & Clients

commissionTiers.title: Simple Service Model

faq.title: FAQ
faq.q1: Do I need to be an experienced speaker?
faq.a1: No! If you have technical AI expertise, we'll help you build your first talk.
faq.a2: Sign up: 5 mins. Approval: 24 hrs. First talk: 1-3 weeks.
faq.a3: Great! Get more clients through us without marketing effort.
faq.a4: No. For Zoom - computer + camera. For in-person - we cover everything.
